src:
Wenger Jelaskan Alasan Keputusan Emery Copot Ban Kapten Arsenal dari Granit Xhaka
07 Nov 2019, 18:57 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsene Wenger yakin Unai Emery menjunjung tinggi nilai-nilai Arsenal dengan memecat Granit Xhaka sebagai kapten The Gunners.
Musim ini, Xhaka ditunjuk sebagai kapten. Ia dipilih melalu proses voting dari semua pemain di skuat Arsenal.
Namun kemudian di awal pekan ini, jabatan ban kapten itu dicopot oleh Emery. Hal tersebut tak lepas dari perseteruan antara pemain asal Swiss itu dengan suporter Arsenal di laga kontrak Crystal Palace.
Xhaka sendiri belum pernah dimainkan oleh Emery sejak insiden tersebut. Ia absen kala Arsenal bermain melawan Liverpool di Carabao Cup, Wolverhamp di Premier League dan Vitoria Guimaraes di Liga Europa.
Xhaka pun disebut sudah tak punya masa depan di Arsenal. Kabarnya ia akan dijual pada bursa transfer musim dingin 2020 nanti.
text:
Wenger Explains the Reason for Emery's Decision to Dismiss Arsenal Captain of Granite Xhaka
Nov 7 2019, 18:57 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Arsene Wenger believes Unai Emery upholds Arsenal's values by firing Granit Xhaka as captain of the Gunners.
This season, Xhaka was appointed as captain. He was chosen through the voting process of all the players in the Arsenal squad.
But then earlier this week, the post of captain was removed by Emery. It was not separated from the feud between the Swiss player and Arsenal supporters in the contract match Crystal Palace.
Xhaka himself has never been played by Emery since the incident. He was absent when Arsenal played against Liverpool in the Carabao Cup, Wolverhamp in the Premier League and Vitoria Guimaraes in the Europa League.
Xhaka was said to have no future at Arsenal. Reportedly he will be sold in the winter 2020 transfer market later.
